thread.title: Elon Musk clarifies earlier remarks, says he doesn’t hate Apple - newsR
thread.title_full: Elon Musk clarifies earlier remarks, says he doesn’t hate Apple - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Elon Musk clarifies earlier remarks, says he doesn’t hate Apple - newsR
text: Elon Musk has taken to Twitter to clarify statements he made in an interview with Handelsblatt last month where he basically said that Apple is the “Telsa Graveyard”. Today he explained that he doesn’t hate the iPhone maker and that it’s “a great company with a lot of talented people.” Right. To be fair, in the Handelsblatt interview, Musk […] »
